attributes.action: Stop current proposed additions to the Sexual Orientation Act, thus restoring traditonal British family values in this country.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Its ridiculous to think that somebody would want to teach a 5 year old about homosexuality. Or to stop Christians from having the right to say they dont want gays on their property sharing a double bed. The Gender and Religion Act, which we all signed last year states we cannot offend anyone on either ground. Therefore it is hypocritical that a Christian should have to submit to allowing something against their religion, and surely proves the original act pointless. Bring back common sense, traditional family values and our Christian heritage.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Stop current proposed additions to the Sexual Orientation Act, thus restoring traditonal British family values in this country."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11467.asp

Prime Minister's Office

Petition info: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/sexorientstop/
